description:
NTS Map: 082J15
This has become an extremely popular conditioning trail. It's short and sustained climb, gaining 716 meters of elevation in 3.8 km. 

The view at the top is great on a clear day you can see Calgary.

There is now an obvious trail all the way to the summit cairn.
directions: Highway 66 at Beaver Lodge Parking lot located halfway between Prairie and Powderface Creek
title: Prairie Mountain
